Materials Used

We used 100% pure Banana's, minerals and eco extracts in our products to make you look and smell amazing.

Delivery at the shake of a Tree

Those Banana's slip straight from the tree, into our technicians magic hands and straight to your door for the freshest of looks. If your not happy we accept hassle free returns.

Quality Assured

Only the best Banana's straight from the tree make it into our bottles. With know-how for our best Banana-ofin's ALL to get your hair looking it's silkiest, healthy and most beautiful.
